```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#used to check what the coloumn names are
colnames(penguins)
#making the graph
penguin_graph<- ggplot(penguins, aes(flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, colour = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() 
  
print(penguin_graph)
```
